name: AntWars (MatHeadGames)
description:
Grow your ant colony and fight through various environments. Featuring pheromone navigation!

Using the desktop version is highly recommended for performance reasons. Web doesn't handle hundreds of ants very well.

Made by: MatHead, Foxie, Daniel Reyes Taha
Font from Kimberly Geswein
Inspiration from Kurzgesagt and Sebastian Lague 
Made for the Godot Wild Jam
